items.name: Loose Brick

items.locationHint: Cafeteria, can be stolen during meals

items.locationHint: Pickpocketed from guards or found in guard stations

items.description: A pouch of tobacco. Common currency among inmates.
items.locationHint: Obtained through trade, commissary, or as payment

items.name: Makeshift Shiv
items.description: A crude weapon fashioned from scrap metal. Dangerous to carry.
items.locationHint: Crafted in workshop or obtained from other inmates

items.locationHint: Drawn by you or obtained from a trusted inmate

items.locationHint: Recreation area or obtained from other inmates

items.name: Family Photo

items.locationHint: Brought with you during intake

items.locationHint: Workshop area, must be smuggled out carefully

items.name: Flashlight

items.locationHint: Laundry room or stolen from guard locker

items.locationHint: Kitchen storage or laundry

items.name: Medical Scrubs

items.name: Pain Medication

items.locationHint: Infirmary or obtained during sick call

items.locationHint: Workshop or smuggled from supply room

items.locationHint: Maintenance storage or workshop

items.name: Razor Blade

items.name: Brass Knuckles

items.locationHint: Crafted in workshop or obtained from gang members

items.name: Disposable Camera

items.name: Pack of Cigarettes
